SEARCH
Module com.github.sttk.cliargs
Package com.github.sttk.cliargs

Class Cmd

java.lang.Object
com.github.sttk.cliargs.Cmd
public class Cmd extends Object
Is the class which contains a command name, command arguments, and option arguments that are parsed from command line arguments without configurations. And this provides methods to check if they are specified and to option them.

    • hasOpt

      public boolean hasOpt(String name)
      Checks if the option is specified in command line arguments.
      Parameters:
      name - The option name.
      Returns:
      True, if the option is specified.

    • getOptArg

      public <T> T getOptArg(String name)
      Gets the first option argument of the specified named option.

      If there is no option argument for the specified option, this method returns null.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of of option argument value.
      Parameters:
      name - The option name.
      Returns:
      The first option argument of the specified option.

    • getOptArgs

      public <T extends List<?>> T getOptArgs(String name)
      Gets the option arguments of the specified named option.

      If there is no option argument for the specified option, this method returns an empty list.

      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of of option argument list.
      Parameters:
      name - The option name.
      Returns:
      The option arguments of the specified option.
